Text: Oh dear-conspiracy theorists on pirate bay- get a grip, get a life.

Well, czechmate67, mt friend; history is littered with REAL conspiracies. It seems to me the people who need to get lives are the ones that bury their heads in the sand and pretend there is no evil in the world.

I have not seen this documentary, but I wouldn't be so foolish as be just another smug lemming who calls hard-nosed researchers 'conspiracy theorists'.

As I said, history is littered with conspiracies! Only an idiot would pretend they never happen.
